page.title: 08A Child in Holwell
page.content: My name is Naomi Chant.I am 9.I live in a detached bungalow. My pets are a rabbit,dog,tortoise,donkey,cat,fish and birds.I have two brothers and two sisters.My brothers' names are Jason and Ben and my sisters' names are Louisa and Emily.My garden is big and wide.There is a paddock for the donkey.On July 6th I went to a ballet show.I had to perform two dances.The puppet dance was fun.I had to wear a clown suit and a little hat.There were a lot of cameras flashing. After the ballet show I went to watch the magician.Jason went up to help the man to do his magic and the man gave him a balloon.I went shopping with Sharon and her Mum and Dad.The van broke down so we had to use my Dad's car.
